task.title: Create a Pay Type
task.shortdesc: A pay type indicates the type of payment (for example, regular or overtime).

taskbody.context: Employees can be paid in many forms including base wages and salary, bonuses, and incentives. Some types of remuneration have special tax implications and must be paid separately from regular wage payments. Other types of remuneration are calculated based on production or services provided. UltiPro enables you to establish earnings groups and earnings that incorporate every type of remuneration your employees receive.

step.cmd: If necessary, enter start and end dates.
Select Yes or No to indicate if this pay type is paid and if the pay type should be added to a group. If the pay type should be added to a group, select the group(s).
Select Save. The newly created pay type appears in the list on the Pay Types page.
